name: 3D Data Description File
summary: Learn about .TDDD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Imagine was originally developed for Amiga computers, but was later released for MS-DOS and Windows platforms. The software is no longer supported. Imagine was previously called TurboSilver.

description: Three-dimensional image data file created by Imagine, a an older 3D modeling and raytracing program; stores 3D objects and optionally observer data; can be used for for rendering 3D images from various observer perspectives.
